entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
